product.title: YATLTE 3 in 1 Auto Rotating Curling Iron - Automatic Hair Curler, Auto Hair Curler Rechargeable Curling Iron, Adjustable Temp, Instant Heat Hair Styling Tools for All Hair Tyes Make Mom's Day
product.product_id: YATLTE 3 in 1 Auto Rotating Curling Iron Clearance
product.description:
✮✮ Hello (✿◠‿◠) Dear Customer, Welcome to Bilqis Store

We Will Give Every Customer The Best Service ✮✮

✅✅ We cares about each customer's true feelings and considers them the key to success.

✅✅ According to the suggestions of the customers, always better with the products.

✅✅ Your 100% satisfaction is our pursuit !!!

Feature:

Material:Alloy

Color: p-ink

Product net weight: 260g/ 0.57in

Product gross weight: 270g/ 0.59in

Product size:30.4x4x4cm/11.96x1.57x1.57 in

Packing size: 34x9x5cm/13.38x3.54x1.96in

Power: 35w

Description: One-Click

Automatic Curling :No skill is required, just put the right amount of hair into the curling tube, press the button and hold for a whlie, then you can get beautifal curls.

IONIC FOR FRIZZ-FREE RESULTS: This straightener brush releases 3 million negative during the straightening process, reducing and frizz in your hair. The negative work by neutralizing positive, which are responsible

for causing frizz, for achieving , shiny, and frizz-free look without the need for harsh chemicals or excessive heat.

LESS FRICTION, LESS DAMAGE: The brush's teeth are coated with our exclusive ceramic, which is ordinary materials and reduces friction

by 50%. This means that the comb glides effortlessly through your hair without pulling or snagging, resulting in less damage to your hair and a

smoother, more polished look.

Lightweight

and Portable:It can be easily put into bags, the preferred styling tool

for business trips and travel. The handle adopts a more comfortable ergonomic design, which is convenient for female partner who love beauty to use it anytime and anywhere.

Quick Styling: takes 5 minutes, you can easily create the perfect hairstyle.

Whether you have long hair, short hair, or a thick exploding head!

Packing Include:x1 electric comb

Feature:

Material:Alloy

Color: p-ink

Product net weight: 260g/ 0.57in

Product gross weight: 270g/ 0.59in

Product size:30.4x4x4cm/11.96x1.57x1.57 in

Packing size: 34x9x5cm/13.38x3.54x1.96in

Power: 35w

Description: One-Click

Automatic Curling :No skill is required, just put the right amount of hair into the curling tube, press the button and hold for a whlie, then you can get beautifal curls.

IONIC FOR FRIZZ-FREE RESULTS: This straightener brush releases 3 million negative during the straightening process, reducing and frizz in your hair. The negative work by neutralizing positive, which are responsible

for causing frizz, for achieving , shiny, and frizz-free look without the need for harsh chemicals or excessive heat.

LESS FRICTION, LESS DAMAGE: The brush's teeth are coated with our exclusive ceramic, which is ordinary materials and reduces friction

by 50%. This means that the comb glides effortlessly through your hair without pulling or snagging, resulting in less damage to your hair and a

smoother, more polished look.

Lightweight

and Portable:It can be easily put into bags, the preferred styling tool

for business trips and travel. The handle adopts a more comfortable ergonomic design, which is convenient for female partner who love beauty to use it anytime and anywhere.

Quick Styling: takes 5 minutes, you can easily create the perfect hairstyle.

Whether you have long hair, short hair, or a thick exploding head!

Packing Include:x1 electric comb * Automatic Curling Iron with Interchangeable Barrels: Easily create perfect hairstyles with our curling wand set featuring bi-directional auto-rotating function and 3 interchangeable ceramic tourmaline barrels , simplifying barrel switching and catering to various curling needs.Turn the barrel cap clockwise until you can't turn it any further, which represents that the installation is complete.Incorrect installation may cause the curling iron to not rotate properly.
 * Precise Temperature Control for All Hair Types: The hair curler's LCD screen displays 12 adjustable temperature settings ranging from 325°F to 430°F, providing precise control and accommodating all hair types, including long hair and hair that's hard to style.
 * Fast Heating and Safe Auto Shut-off: Experience instant heat in just 30 seconds with the hair styling tool's fast heating technology, while the 60-minute auto shut-off function adds an extra layer of safety to your collection.
 * Dual Voltage and Tangle-Free Design: Perfect for worldwide use, the dual voltage hair crimper (100V-240V) features an extra-long barrel and 360-degree rotating power cord to prevent tangles. The ceramic tourmaline barrel produces negative ions, reducing hair damage and leaving it shiny and healthy.
 * Complete Package for Safe Usage and Storage: The set includes a heat-resistant silicone pad, glove, and clip to ensure safe usage and convenient storage. Create stunning, long-lasting waves and curls with this professional hair styling tool, making it an ideal choice for both personal and professional use.

The ceramic tourmaline barrel produces negative ions, reducing hair damage and leaving it shiny and healthy.
  • Complete Package for Safe Usage and Storage: The set includes a heat-resistant silicone pad, glove, and clip to ensure safe usage and convenient storage. protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
